___dataplane_ip.description: The first loopback ip (of the logical interface) if present

___physical_interfaces_list.description: List of physical interfaces (and other information) to be created or updated by vnc

___physical_interface_port_id.description: SNMP index of the physical interface imported as port-id. Should be a stringified number

___physical_interface_mac_address.description: Mac address of the physical interface

___logical_interfaces_list.description: List of logical interfaces (and other information) to be created or updated by vnc

___logical_interface_vlan_tag.description: Vlan id the logical interface belongs to. Should be a stringified number

___logical_interface_type.description: Family type of the logical interface. Can be l3/ l2

___logical_interface_name.description: Could be just the unit number or of the physical_interface.logical_unit_number format
